item.title: Small model, big impact: Patronus AI’s Glider outperforms GPT-4 in key AI benchmarks
item.description: Patronus AI launches Glider, a breakthrough 3.8B-parameter language model that rivals GPT-4's evaluation capabilities while running on-device, offerin...

item.title: Beyond LLMs: How SandboxAQ’s large quantitative models could optimize enterprise AI
item.description: Alphabet spinout SandboxAQ is advancing large quantitative models to help enterprise AI optimize value creation.

item.title: OpenAI’s new hotline: Chat with ChatGPT anytime, anywhere
item.description: Users can now give ChatGPT a ring and ask questions. (800)-ChatGPT accepts any device that can make calls, even for those without a data plan

item.title: Slack is becoming an AI workplace: Here’s what that means for your job
item.description: Slack is evolving from a simple messaging app into an AI-powered workplace platform where digital agents work alongside humans.

item.title: GitHub is making its AI programming Copilot free for VS Code developers — with limits
item.description: The service leverages advanced AI models, including Anthropic’s Claude 3.5 Sonnet and OpenAI’s GPT-4o, with limits.
